title: A proclamation against the deceiptfull wynding and folding of wooles

publisher: Imprinted at London in Powles Churchyard by Richard Iugge, and Iohn Cawood ...,
notes: "Yeuen [sic] at our Manour of Greenwich the x. of August, in the fourth yeere of our raigne. Anno.M.D.LXII."
